mapper.select: select p.pid, p.paracontent, p.paraindex, p.document_id from paragraph p where p.document_id=#{docId} ORDER BY p.pid

select p.pid, p.paracontent, p.paraindex, p.document_id, dte.label_id, dte.index_begin,dte.index_end, tl.color, dp.dotime,dp.comptime,dp.dtstatus from paragraph p left join d_paragraph dp on (dp.dtask_id=#{dTaskId} and p.pid=dp.paragraph_id) left join dt_extraction dte on dp.dtid =dte.dt_id left join task_label tl on tl.task_id =#{taskId} and dte.label_id=tl.label_id where p.document_id=#{docId} ORDER BY p.pid

select p.pid, p.paracontent, p.paraindex, p.document_id, dte.label_id, dte.index_begin,dte.index_end, tl.color, dp.dotime,dp.comptime,dp.dtstatus from paragraph p left join d_paragraph dp on (dp.dtask_id=#{dTaskId} and p.pid=dp.paragraph_id) left join dt_extraction dte on dp.dtid =dte.dt_id left join task_label tl on tl.task_id =#{taskId} and dte.label_id=tl.label_id where p.document_id=#{docId} and ( dp.dtstatus =#{status} or dp.dtstatus is null) ORDER BY p.pid
mapper.insert: insert into dt_extraction (dtd_id, dt_id, label_id, index_begin, index_end) values (#{dtdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{indexBegin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{indexEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select dtd_id, dt_id, label_id, index_begin, index_end from dt_extraction

SELECT any_value(dc.filename) docName, pa.paraindex paraIndex, lb.labelname labelName, SUBSTR(paraContent,any_value(dte.index_begin)+1,any_value(dte.index_end)-any_value(dte.index_begin)) subContent, count(*) as labelNum FROM d_task dt left join d_paragraph dp on dt.tkid=dp.dtask_id left join dt_extraction dte on dte.dt_id=dp.dtid left join document dc on dc.did=dp.document_id left join paragraph pa on pa.pid = dp.paragraph_id left join label lb on lb.lid=dte.label_id where dt.task_id=#{tid} group by dte.label_id,dp.paragraph_id,any_value(dte.index_begin),any_value(dte.index_end) order by dp.paragraph_id;
